attributes.action: Limit the massive influx of people into the UK.
attributes.background: The pressure on NHS and housing in UK is too great to accept additional burdens.  Already we need to build 270000 new houses every year to met existing demand.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107106

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
